title: FalsifierSet
description: A structured set of falsifiers and boundary conditions used to pressure-test claims and strategies under the Genesis Protocol.

falsifier_set_id.description: Unique identifier for this falsifier set.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when falsifiers were generated.

agent_identity.description: Agent or human identifier (e.g., Skynet / ElmatadorZ).

claim_or_strategy.description: The claim, recommendation, or strategy being pressure-tested.

test_statement.description: A concrete statement that, if proven true, invalidates the claim/strategy.

how_to_test.description: Practical method to test this falsifier.

data_needed.description: Data required to execute the test.

pass_condition.description: Condition under which the falsifier does NOT invalidate the claim.

fail_condition.description: Condition under which the falsifier invalidates the claim.

severity.description: Severity of failure if this falsifier triggers.

boundary_conditions.description: Conditions under which the claim/strategy is not expected to work.

stop_triggers.description: Triggers that require stopping execution or revisiting the strategy.

confidence_impact.description: Explanation of how falsifiers and boundaries affect confidence.
